name: Cisco 8-Port Gigabit Rackmount Unmanaged Network Switch (CBS110-8T-D-IN)

description: Premium LGA1700 motherboard with 20+1 power stages, PCIe 5.0 slots, Thunderbolt 4, and WiFi 6E. For high-end Intel builds.

name: Intel Core i7-14700K Processor
description: 14th Gen processor with 20 cores (8P+12E) and 28 threads. Up to 5.6GHz boost. Excellent for gaming, streaming, and productivity.

name: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4070 Super 12GB
description: 1440p gaming powerhouse with DLSS 3.5, 12GB GDDR6X memory. Excellent ray tracing performance. Efficient Ada Lovelace architecture.

name: WD Black SN850X 2TB NVMe M.2 SSD
description: High-performance PCIe 4.0 SSD with 7300MB/s read speeds. Gaming Mode 2.0 and built-in thermal management. 2TB capacity.

name: Logitech G Pro X Mechanical Gaming Keyboard
description: Tenkeyless mechanical keyboard with GX Blue Clicky switches (hot-swappable), LIGHTSYNC RGB, and tournament-ready design. Durable compact build.

name: Razer BlackWidow V3 Mechanical Keyboard
description: Full-size mechanical keyboard with Razer Green clicky switches, customizable Chroma RGB, and dedicated media controls. Aluminum top plate.

name: Cosmic Byte CB-GK-18 Firefly Tenkeyless Keyboard
description: Budget mechanical-feel keyboard with Outemu Blue switches, rainbow LED backlighting, and anti-ghosting. Great entry-level option for Indian gamers.

name: Logitech G502 X Plus Lightspeed Wireless Gaming Mouse
description: Wireless gaming mouse with LIGHTFORCE hybrid switches, HERO 25K sensor, LIGHTSYNC RGB, and adjustable weight system. Lightspeed wireless technology.

name: Razer DeathAdder V2 Gaming Mouse
description: Ergonomic wired gaming mouse with Focus+ 20K DPI optical sensor, 8 programmable buttons, and Razer Speedflex cable. Classic shape improved.

name: SteelSeries Rival 3 Wireless Gaming Mouse
description: Affordable wireless gaming mouse with 200+ hour battery life, TrueMove Core sensor, and lightweight design. Dual connectivity (Bluetooth/2.4GHz).

name: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless Gaming Headset
description: Multi-platform wireless headset with Sonar audio software, 38-hour battery, ClearCast Gen 2 microphone, and simultaneous Bluetooth + 2.4GHz.

name: HyperX Cloud II Wireless Gaming Headset
description: Wireless 7.1 surround sound headset with 30-hour battery, memory foam ear cushions, and detachable noise-cancelling microphone. Comfortable for long sessions.

name: Cosmic Byte H5 Wired Gaming Headset
description: Budget wired gaming headset with 7.1 virtual surround, noise-cancelling microphone, RGB lighting, and over-ear design. Good value for money.

name: Xbox Wireless Controller (Carbon Black)
description: Official Xbox controller with Bluetooth, textured grip, hybrid D-pad, and custom button mapping via Xbox Accessories app. Works on Xbox, PC, and mobile.

name: Sony PlayStation DualSense Wireless Controller
description: PS5 controller with adaptive triggers, haptic feedback, built-in microphone, and create button. Also works with PC via Bluetooth or USB.

name: Razer Wolverine V2 Chroma Wired Controller
description: Pro wired controller for Xbox/PC with Razer Mecha-Tactile action buttons, 6 remappable triggers, Chroma RGB, and trigger stop switches.

name: SteelSeries QcK Heavy XXL Gaming Mousepad
description: Extra-large (900x400x6mm) cloth mousepad with optimized surface for precision tracking and non-slip rubber base. Fits keyboard and mouse.

name: Razer Goliathus Chroma Extended Gaming Mousepad
description: Extended RGB mousepad with customizable Chroma lighting, micro-textured surface, and anti-fray stitching. 355x255mm size with USB connectivity.

name: Redgear MP80 Speed-Type Gaming Mousepad
description: Budget large gaming mousepad (800x300mm) with water-resistant surface, anti-skid rubber base, and stitched edges. Popular in Indian market.

name: Elgato Wave DX Broadcast Microphone
description: XLR broadcast dynamic microphone with professional-grade sound, tight polar pattern for noise rejection, and built-in pop filter. Ideal for streaming.

name: HP Smart Tank 520 All-in-One Printer
description: Ink tank all-in-one printer with print, scan, copy functions. Includes 2 years of ink (up to 8,000 color pages), Wi-Fi Direct, and automatic document feeder. Low cost per page.

name: Epson EcoTank L3210 All-in-One Printer
description: Popular ink tank printer with print, scan, copy. Comes with 2 years of ink (up to 7,500 pages), USB connectivity, and compact design. Excellent for home and small offices.

name: Canon PIXMA G3070 All-in-One Printer
description: Ink tank printer with print, scan, copy, Wi-Fi, Ethernet, and 2-line LCD. Includes 2 years of ink (up to 6,000 pages). Supports auto duplex printing.

name: Brother DCP-T420W All-in-One Ink Tank Printer
description: Compact ink tank printer with print, scan, copy, Wi-Fi, and NFC connectivity. Includes 1 year of ink (up to 6,500 pages). Ideal for small office space.

name: HP LaserJet Pro MFP M428fdw Printer
description: Monochrome laser all-in-one with print, scan, copy, fax. Automatic document feeder, duplex printing, Wi-Fi, Ethernet. Fast printing up to 40ppm. For medium offices.

name: Xerox B205 All-in-One Multifunction Printer
description: Compact monochrome laser printer with print, scan, copy. Wi-Fi, Ethernet, USB connectivity. Prints up to 26ppm. Energy efficient with low running costs.

name: Epson Perfection V39 Color Photo Scanner
description: Compact color photo and document scanner with 4800 dpi optical resolution. Includes one-touch buttons, LED light source, and Easy Photo Fix software.

name: Canon CanoScan LiDE 300 Scanner
description: Slim, portable USB-powered scanner with 2400 dpi resolution. 4 buttons for quick scanning, includes Document Capture Pro software. No external power needed.

name: Brother ADS-1700W Compact Desktop Scanner
description: Professional desktop scanner with automatic document feeder (20 pages), Wi-Fi, duplex scanning, up to 30ppm. OCR software included for business use.

name: Xiaomi Mi Smart Compact Projector 2
description: Portable smart projector with 1080p resolution, 500 ANSI lumens, Android TV, auto focus, and keystone correction. Compact design for mobile presentations.

name: Epson EB-E01 3LCD Projector
description: Office projector with 3LCD technology, 3300 lumens, SVGA resolution (800x600), HDMI, VGA ports. Bright enough for lit rooms. Lamp life up to 12,000 hours.

name: BenQ MS550 Business Projector
description: High-brightness business projector with 4000 lumens, WXGA resolution (1280x800), HDMI, VGA, USB. 10W speaker, vertical keystone correction. For medium conference rooms.

name: Godrej 4-Drawer Steel File Cabinet
description: Steel filing cabinet with 4 drawers, lock and key, letter/A4 size capacity. Sturdy construction, smooth ball bearing slides. Standard office storage solution.

name: AmazonBasics Heavy-Duty Paper Shredder
description: Cross-cut paper shredder with 12-sheet capacity, auto start/stop, safety lock, 16L bin. Shreds credit cards. For confidential document destruction.

name: Honeywell HAC35M Air Circulator Fan
description: Quiet air circulator with 3 speeds, 90° oscillation, remote control, timer function. Improves air circulation in office spaces. Energy efficient.
